name: Garfelf's Guide and the Cross-Platforming Within (+ Momo "DLC")
name_original: Garfelf's Guide and the Cross-Platforming Within (+ Momo "DLC")
description:
This is the port of the Garfelf's Guide 2 on Mac, Linux and for some reason Windows.

What do you need to do in this mod?

In this mod, you play as Jordan, who is back in the Garfelf's Schoolhouse to avenge his friend who was unfortunately poisoned by the corrupted hands of Johnny Old Boy by stealing all the lasagnas and burning them in the forest to free all the souls trapped there at the hands of Johnny Old Boy. As you progress further and further, Johnny Old Boy gets angry, and tries to hunts you down and keep your soul in the now abandoned Garfelf's Schoolhouse for all eternity. You must fight your way through the journey and all the other souls, endlessly roaming the hall in endless pain and agony. They will try to stop you from escaping this unforgiving hellhole while Johnny Old Boy tries to hunt you down.

In the non-canon "Momo DLC", Johnny Old Boy is replaced with Momo, who was quite famous in 2018.

Controls

Copy-pasted from the original BBiEaL itch.io page.

Use the WASD keys to move, and the mouse to turn. Left click to open doors and pick up items, right click to use the currently selected item, and scroll wheel to change the currently selected item. Hold down shift to run (Keep an eye on your stamina bar!), and press space bar to quickly look behind you. Escape can be used to pause.

Credits
  • CubeMasterPro - made the original mod for Windows and the addition to it
  • Micah McGonigal (a.k.a. mystman12) - made the original game
  • Daniilsuperx and YuraSuper2048 - the guys who made Baldi Open Modding Tool, that I used to build the mod
  • You - played my port
